name: Ggj2014
body:
![](http://globalgamejam.org/sites/default/files/styles/game_content__wide/public/games/screenshots/still_7.png)

# Contrast
2D side scroller, puzzle game, will you be the fighter or the problem solver?
## Uncompleted
We ran into several issues during this Jam. It was our first Games Jam. 
Couple this with lack of experience from some members, and lack of commitment from others it was a miracle we got anything done!

Diversifiers: 
* You Only Live Thrice:The player only has 3 lives and each level starts over when you die.
* I am who I want to be:The game has characters, but nothing in their design suggests a gender.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qfG1O6C2N_Y
